Miracle's Hiring Drive
Install your career gear for a ravishing future
READ MORE
October 23rd, 2016
09:00 AM IST
Miracle Heights
 
Want to fulfil your dreams of building a career in one of the best IT organizations? Then, here is a golden chance, grab it! and make all your cherished desires come true. Miracle is on a hiring spree for graduates and post graduates, both freshers, and experienced. Don't slip this chance! Go through the below Job Fair Details and the requirements, and find your perfect job.
Interview Date : October 23rd, 2016 (Sunday)
Interview Timing : Walk-in from 9:30 AM
Interview Venue : Miracle Heights, Hill No-1, Chinna Rushikonda, Visakhapatnam
Transportation : Miracle buses will be available to the Job fair location for every 30 minutes starting from 8:15 AM to 12:00 PM at Port Stadium, Akkayyapalem, Visakhapatnam.
Please carry the below mentioned documents :
  • Hard copy of your latest resume
  • 2 passport sized photos
  • Photocopies of all your certificates
Shortly About Us!!
Miracle Software Systems, Inc. is a Global Systems Integrator headquartered in Novi, Michigan. With over 20 years of experience and 2000 employees globally, it has been helping numerous Fortune 1000 customers achieve their business goals. Miracle's expertise spans across Application Development and Management, Cloud Infrastructure and Applications, Hybrid Integration, ERP Development and Support, and Information Management.
Know More
Freshers Positions
Software Trainee
B. Tech (CSE/IT/ECE)/MCA - 2015/16 passouts with 65% are eligible, good knowledge in Core Java, and excellent communication skills are a must, and Java certification is an added advantage.
Business Development Executive
Any Degree/MBA - 2014/15/16 passouts possessing flexibility with US shifts, good comm. Skills, IT and business knowledge, and ability to drive business meets through phone/email are eligible.
 
US-IT Recruiter
Any Degree/MBA - 2014/15/16 passouts are eligible, excellent comm. skills, flexible with US shifts, ability to search profiles on job portals, and run end to end recruitment process are a must.
Content Analyst
B. Tech/MCA/MBA - 2014/15/16 passouts with 60% are eligible, excellent communication skills, creative skills, writing skills are a must, and knowledge in HTML/CSS is an added advantage.
 
Freshers & Experienced Positions
PMO Executive
Any Degree/MBA - 2014/15/16 passouts are eligible, excellent communication skills, soft skills, flexibility with US shifts are a must. And, knowledge of MS Office Tools is an added advantage.
Soft Skills Trainer
Any Degree/PG with 0 - 2 yrs of experience in teaching/training communicative english, excellent comm. skills, and ability to carry out soft skills training for new hires are a must.
 
Sr. Business Development Executive
1 - 3 years of experience in the same field are eligible, should have good communication skills, ability to schedule F2F meetings with customers, find service opportunities, and software sales.
Sr. US-IT Recruiter
2 - 5 years of experience in US IT Staffing is must, should have excellent comm. skills, technical screening skills, and thorough understanding of IT terminologies and technologies.
 
About AP Cloud Initiative
AP Cloud is an initiative backed by Miracle Software Systems, Inc. to create 100,000 Digital Transformation Professionals in the Sunrise State of Andhra Pradesh. The AP Cloud Initiative has begun its first wave on 05th August, 2016 which upholds a vision of developing skillful professionals in the Digital Transformation platform. This program helps people make a career in this platform and thereby increases the economic impact on the state.
Know More
Sr. Development Positions
Dot Net Lead (with Azure & SQL)
8+ years of experience in .net projects and excellent working programming skills in C#, ASP.Net, Bootstrap, SQL, and Azure development is mandatory.
Sr. Solution Architect (Microsoft Practice)
9+ years of IT experience focused on Microsoft Technology Platform, sound knowledge on various architectural patterns, design standards, and methodologies is mandatory.
Sr. SharePoint Developer
8+ years of experience in SharePoint development, deep knowledge in Server side object model, CSOM, JQuery, RESTful services, OData, and OAuth is a must.
NOC Engineer
4 - 6 years of experience, good expo on windows server and active directory management, good knowledge on configuration and tuning of OS related parameters are a must.
EDI Business Analyst
6+ Years of experience, being good at communicating across functional areas at different levels, sound knowledge on OpenText BizTalk mapper and process orchestration are a must.
